Files | Data Structures | Typedefs | Enumerations | Functions
CRC Diag Lib

Files

file  diagLib_crc.h
 This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the software test library file of CRC. This also contains some related macros.
 

Data Structures

struct  DiagLib_CrcTestParams
 Structure containing input parameters for CRC software test. More...
 
struct  DiagLib_CrcOutParams
 Structure containing output parameters for CRC software test. More...
 
struct  DiagLib_CrcObj
 Structure containing intermediate parameters and final test result. This is purely readonly for the user. User should declare this structure and give it to the lib. User should not modify this. More...

typedef struct DiagLib_CrcObj DiagLib_CrcObj_t

enum  DiagLib_CrcTestStates {
  DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_TIMEOUT = -((int32_t) 4), DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_INVALID_PARAMS = -((int32_t) 3), DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_BADARGS = -((int32_t) 2), DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_FAIL = -((int32_t) 1),

Detailed Description

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum DiagLib_CrcBitSize

Enum to select the bit width.

Enumerator
DIAGLIB_CRC_BIT_64 

Select 64 bit mode for CRC

DIAGLIB_CRC_BIT_32 

Select 32 bit mode for CRC

enum DiagLib_CrcCheckMode

Enum to select the mode to check CRC compression.

Enumerator
DIAGLIB_CRC_INTERRUPT_MODE 

Select interrupt mode for CRC

DIAGLIB_CRC_POLLED_MODE 

Select polled mode for CRC

enum DiagLib_CrcTestStates

Enum to represent the state of the test.

Enumerator
DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_TIMEOUT 

The test has timedout

DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_INVALID_PARAMS 

The test has failed due to invalid parameters

DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_BADARGS 

The test has failed due to bad arguments

DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_FAIL 

The test has failed in atleast one iteration

DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_PASS 

The test has passed in all iterations till now

DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_PENDING 

The test is still running an iteration

enum DiagLib_CrcTestType

Enum to select the type CRC comparision.

Enumerator
DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_INBUILT 

Select inbuit CRC test to compare the crc value with golden crc User need not provide any input test data

DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_USER 

Select user CRC test for comparision of c-mode value and hw crc vlaue for the given user input

DIAGLIB_CRC_TEST_GET_CRC 

Select CRC test none for only getting the CRC values from HW or c-model without any comparision

DiagLib_CrcOutParams_t *  outParams,
DiagLib_CrcObj_t *  crcObj 
)

This API is used for CRC software test for handling ISR. It sets all parameters issued by the app and start CRC compression.

Parameters
testParamsPointer to structure DiagLib_CrcTestParams_t.
outParamsPointer to structure DiagLib_CrcOutParams_t.
crcObjPointer to structure DiagLib_CrcObj_t.
Returns
status ISR check status.
int32_t DiagLib_crcStartTest ( const DiagLib_CrcTestParams_t *  testParams,
DiagLib_CrcOutParams_t *  outParams,
DiagLib_CrcObj_t *  crcObj 
)

This API is used for CRC software test. It sets all parameters issued by the app and start CRC compression.

Parameters
testParamsPointer to structure DiagLib_CrcTestParams_t.
outParamsPointer to structure DiagLib_CrcOutParams_t.
crcObjPointer to structure DiagLib_CrcObj_t.
Returns
status Test status.
void DiagLibCrcTestParams_init ( DiagLib_CrcTestParams_t *  testParams)

This API is used for initializing CRC test params to default. This API has to be called from app before starting the test.

Parameters
testParamsPointer to structure DiagLib_CrcTestParams_t. Populated with all the default values required for testing of CRC functionality.
Returns
None.
